summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6215 for the improvement of that certain watermain easement conveyed to the City of Seattle identified as Comptroller's File No. 163958, and accepted by Ordinance No. 69582, said easement being located without specific description in the undedicated streets of the Unrecorded Plat of Sand Point Country Club and named in said plat as Fairway Drive and Fairway Drive (westerly roadway) from East 75th Street to Lakemont Drive on the north; and certain other undedicated streets; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 88577, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
